refnamediv.para: This page lists all the functions to manipulate Scilab native objects containing doubles.

refsection.literal:
scilabVar
scilab_createDoubleMatrix(
scilabEnv
env, int dim, const int* dims, int complex)
refsection.para: Create a double matrix with dim dimensions (dims[0], dims[1], ..., dims[dim-1]).
complex: 0 to real matrix or 1 to complex matrix

env, int row, int col, int complex)
refsection.para: Create a double matrix with 2 dimensions (row, col).
